EmailTemplate.name: 9/14/13 WhiteSox Final Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Let's go White Sox!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
I just wanted to make sure that you all had the information on tomorrow's game(Copied below).
Here is the down and dirty, I will be near Gate 2 with the rest of the IAVA staff at 4:30PM with your tickets. PLEASE NOTE THAT GATE 2 IS A CHANGE FROM PREVIOUS INFORMATION. Game starts at 6:10PM and our check in table will be closed by 7PM. Please be sure to stop by and say hi - and get your tickets. Go Sox!
Cheers,
Matt
Matt Colvin, USAF
Strategic Partnerships Senior Associate
Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
Forwarded message From: Team IAVA Subject: Fwd: Final Confirmation and Reminder: IAVA-Miller High Life Chicago White Sox vs. Cleveland Indians Game, 9/14
Dear IAVA Member:
If you are receiving this message, you have final confirmed for the IAVA-Miller High Life Chicago White Sox vs. Cleveland Indians game taking place on Saturday, September 14. Details of the day are below: What: Chicago White Sox vs. Cleveland Indians When: Saturday, September 14: First pitch at 6:10 p.m.; pre-game party begins at 4:30 p.m. Where: U.S. Cellular Field - 333 W. 35th Street, Chicago, IL 60616
Logistics Driving Directions Seating Map of U.S. Cellular Field
Tickets Tickets for the game can be picked up at the Will Call window located next to the IAVA table near Gate 1 (right field) at U.S. Cellular Field starting at 4:30 p.m. Once you receive your tickets, you will be directed to the pre-game party with food and drinks. The pre-game party begins at 4:30 p.m.
Parade Lap All IAVA member veterans who are 21 and over are invited to participate in a parade lap on the field prior to the start of the game. To participate, member veterans need to meet in the hallway outside the pre-game party patio at 5:15 p.m. The parade lap will begin at 5:30 p.m.
Questions & Cancellations If you have any questions or your plans have changed and you can no longer attend the game, please email rucksack@iava.org as soon as possible.
Thank you and have a great time at the game!
Best, Team IAVA
